main event: A navigator on a C-47 aircraft observed a luminous trail on the surface of the sea while flying from Tanger to Casablanca.
interesting points: The trail was approximately 10,000 yards long and 30-40 yards wide., The luminous trail was observed for about 2-3 minutes before it faded away., The color of the trail was white/bluish green with no definable shape., A thorough observation was conducted by the aircraft but the phenomena could not be identified., The weather conditions were clear with good visibility during the sighting.
sighted object: luminous trail on the surface of the sea
